data.title: Coventry Climax
data.meta_description: 66.67mm stroke new crankshaft, EN40B material, Ford main journal size, MGB big end journal size. £2950 + VAT
data.text:
Coventry Climax FWA / B / E Aluminium CNC machined crankshaft pulley

Aluminium grade 6082 suitable for anodising. A speedi-sleeve can be supplied at additional cost if you wish go this route.

​

£ 120 + VAT

Coventry Climax FWA / B / E Aluminium CNC machined water pump pulley

Aluminium grade 6082 suitable for anodising. drilled and tapped to accept 1/4" UNF grub screw.

£ 120 + VAT​

Coventry Climax FWA / B / E parts

Many new and second hand components available

​Please call to discuss availability and prices - 07775 734007

Coventry Climax FPF parts

Many new and second hand components available

Please call to discuss availability and prices - 07775 734007

Coventry Climax FWA / B / E Aluminium CNC machined 5 bearing camshaft carrier

These carriers are produced 1/8" taller than standard and can be machined to suit skimmed heads and blocks for correct chain tension. Accept Lotus Twin cam tappet buckets.​

£ 950 plus VAT

Please contact me to purchase.
